body: I wish she died in pain and misery while being abused like a slut like her should and her cuck boyfriend should commit suicide after while idc about the abusers.. They founded an opportunity and took it can't really blame them for being heartless towards an actual lower life form

I kind off agree with not feeling sorry for her and specially the boyfriend/husband, why? Why did he married her at the end? Why is it that NTR authors like to go with this route it makes no sense, but then again they're both horrible people so here's hoping they die of a horrible disease.
The author is not human clearly not a human.

This story is a waste of time. The characters are unlikable (Risa is a filthy slut who cheats on her boyfriend/husband repeatedly, Cuck-Kun is either too big of a pussy to make Futa-Chan stop and maybe forever leave her for someone more loyal/more female or actually gets off on other men fucking his waifu). Nobody changes to be better (Risa sluts around in university and the last page suggests she'll let the stranger she's talking to fuck her). Frankly, I was hoping for Risa to be castrated in one of her games. Even then, I hoped her mom disowned her nasty (and I bet diseased, you know that a girl who gets fucked like Risa with no protection should have a sewer pussy/ass) ass after I saw how angry she was about what her daughter did (the mom made mistakes but her daughter is damn filthy). Hell, maybe she could have afforded a surgery to chop her boy parts off considering she did prostitution/porn. The art's not even pretty enough to make up for it (too grotesque in way too many ways).

To the commentor who said he feels sorry for Risa: Don't be, not at all. She's a whore who brings her so-called "suffering" on herself. It's not her mother. It's not having a cock. It's her. The ending even has a flashback where a girl who helped gangbang Risa back in grade school points out that she's only pretending to be ashamed of all the fucking. She doesn't care enough about her boyfriend/husband to not cheat on him whenever she can. I suspect that deep down she only sees him as an escape hatch, as the one man who'll carry her around on his back without holding her to a higher standard. I hoped that Mr. Cuckberg finally cut her off forever and maybw found a new woman before I saw just how big of a cuck /coward he really is. If there's a silver lining for this it's that they don't look to have any kids and Risa might not be able to have any without science helping (maybe has no ovaries, her sperm might be blank).

Basically on the last chapter, they got married. She left a note as a prank saying she's going to leave him behind to follow some other guys that can give her more pleasure. They talked a bit then she remembered back what the other friend ( that girl that bullied her as well) said to her: " you're pretending that you hate being bullied and treated like this.." 

Next, a guy came and showed her the video. She said that it was during the time of University. She couldn't fit in and she was mistreated by everyone, including the seniors. She was passed around like a tool, doing perverted acts.


On the last scene, she asked that guy:

" So.."
" I wonder what I can do for you"

My take: she is looking forward to get bullied again
